#### Log Axes

```{r, results = 'hide'}
library(plotly)
d <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]
# without log scales
p <- plot_ly(d, x = ~carat, y = ~price) %>% add_markers()
p
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="log/no-log")
```

```{r, results = 'hide'}
# with log scales
layout(p, xaxis = list(type = "log"),
       yaxis = list(type = "log"))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="log/log")
```
